articles.description: Read more about HEADLINE at PTI. Find out more Breaking News and Latest News Headlines from India and around the world HEADLINE word to be replaced by the headline
articles.content: New Delhi, May 2 (PTI) New research has found that 6,000 years ago, the grounded edge of the West Antarctic Ice Sheet may have been as far as 250 kilometres inland from its current location, suggesti… [+452 chars]
